data.eml:eml: Species diversity in the Palaeotropical leaf-litter genus Apelaunothrips (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mound, Laurence A. (2013): Species diversity in the Palaeotropical leaf-litter genus Apelaunothrips (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripinae). Zootaxa 3741 (1): 181-193, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3741.1.7
